title: Southern Glazer’s Wine & Spirits Appoints Randy Barnhart to Vice President, Government Affairs, East Region
text:
MIAMI & DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Southern Glazer’s Wine & Spirits (“Southern Glazer’s”)—the largest North American wine and spirits distribution company—today announced that it has appointed Randy Barnhart to the role of Vice President, Government Affairs, East Region. In this role, Mr. Barnhart will report directly to Steven Becker, Executive Vice President, Treasurer and Compliance, and work as part of the Company’s Regulatory, Compliance and Government Affairs team. He will be responsible for representing Southern Glazer’s in legislative and regulatory matters, as well as handling trade practice compliance across the Company’s East Region Control States including New Hampshire, Vermont, Pennsylvania, Virginia, Maine, North Carolina, Michigan, Ohio and West Virginia, as well as 5 Open States, including Maryland, District of Colombia, Delaware, Kentucky and South Carolina. Randy will also be responsible for government affairs for Canada.
“Randy’s extensive experience in the beverage alcohol business makes him well equipped to manage the important relationships we maintain with state and local governments, and agencies that govern the wholesale industry,” commented Steve Becker. “He will be an outstanding addition to our expert team.”
Randy Barnhart most recently served as Vice President and General Manager of Southern Glazer’s of New England. He began his career in the beverage alcohol business in 1979 in Maryland as a warehouseman and driver for a beer distributor. He joined Joseph E. Seagram & Sons, Inc. in 1983 and worked in various sales and marketing roles during his tenures throughout the East coast. In 2003, he joined United Beverages as a divisional VP of Sales in New Hampshire. Randy joined Southern Glazer’s in 2005 with the Company’s acquisition of United Beverages.
About Southern Glazer’s Wine & Spirits
Southern Glazer’s Wine & Spirits is North America’s largest wine and spirits distributor, and the preeminent data insights company for alcoholic beverages. The Company has operations in 44 U.S. states and the District of Columbia, Canada, and the Caribbean, and employs more than 20,000 team members. Southern Glazer’s urges all retail customers and adult consumers to market, sell, serve, and enjoy its products responsibly. For more information visit www.southernglazers.com .
